{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aruba Networks |model=AP-124 |revision= |series=N900 |fcc_date=09/11/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=access point |fcc_id=Q9DAP124125SDR |ic_id=4675-AP124125 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af, at |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5010 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=16 |ram1=64 |expansion_if_types=PCI (non-standard connector), |expansion_minipci_num=2 |serial=yes,, RJ45,, console,, |wi1_module_if=PCI (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9160 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9106 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,PR-SMA, |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module_if=PCI (non-standard connector) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9160 |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR9106 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,PR-SMA, |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Atheros |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3203S;;1; ,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1; ,,, 100V 802.3af PoE-PD DC/DC Controller;Texas Instruments;TPS23750;;1; |stock_boot=APBoot;1.08.3; |stock_os=ArubaOS;6.4.2.3; |802dot11_protocols=abgn |oui=00:24:6C,6C:F3:7F,D8:C7:C8 |oui_eth=00:24:6C,6C:F3:7F,D8:C7:C8 }} {{TagLine|802.11a/b/g/n Wireless Access Point AP124}} :[http://www.arubanetworks.com/pdf/products/DS_AP124-125.pdf Datasheet] {{â€¢}} [https://apps.fcc.gov/eas/GetApplicationAttachment.html?id=950564 Install Guide]
This device has a stand-alone RF module which houses both of the ''[[Atheros]]'' radios.
